2. NdeI restriction enzyme site: An NdeI restriction enzyme site is not a disease, but it is a specific sequence of DNA that the NdeI enzyme recognizes and cuts during genetic manipulations. The destruction of this site is not a disease, but it can impact the ability to use the NdeI enzyme for genetic engineering purposes.
